title: karuNa ennadhu
sahitya:
Karuna ennadu galkuno

Karuna sagara ..neeku   



anupallavi



 Nirupama sundara nirmala rupa   

        Niravadi kori yunna napai       



caraNam



Mandhara dhara mukunda neevu    

        Antaryami ananda kara   

        Chinta teerpumu srikara 

        Santatamu sura bharani sannuta
